summary: I moved to the Netherlands in 2008 from Scotland following my wife here to live in ''Zuid Holland''. After Studying and doing my masters at the UVA I have had several jobs within the Supply chain industry. In these roles I have had a lot of luck to be involved in diverse and different Supply chains, working in areas from clothing and textile to food stuffs and Production printing to industrial solutions. In essence during the last several years I have grown through a number of roles and a few companies as I build up my understanding of SC and broaden my knowledge in best practices while gaining experience as I go. In my current role I'm working within a matrix org managing a global team in EMEA and AP which is an excellent learning curve on managing teams remotely and communications impact on our ability to perform effectively.  .

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Global Supply Planning Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managing a global team of 9 Planner buyers based in EMEA and AP regions within a matrix org
Responsible for the key asks of inventory management for goods into 18 main DC's worldwide for our branded finished goods procurement from our 3rd party suppliers, including DOH, standard processing and the complexities around SS management, E & O process alongside short term forecasting.  
Main asks also include managing the buyer responsibilities in line with our global SSO org to ensure we have first class alignment with our Sourcing and commodity teams globally.
This is all required whilst keeping the clear goal of service for our end customers and meeting standard lead time/promise date metrics to ensure we have an excellent customer experience.
